segments.text: I am sorry for damaging your car , sir .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Don't worry about it . Just leave it to the insurance companies .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: The car park in this community is over crowded , isn't it ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yeah , more and more cars . People should try to take public transportation .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: There aren't enough buses in this city , are there ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yeah , sometimes I really feel like writing a letter to the mayor .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That's too much of hassle . We just want a little bigger parking space .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Have you taken this to the property management , yet ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No . but I'm gonna . You know , several months ago , I backed into red Honda when parking .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No , right here in the parking lot . It was parked right here in your space . The left rearview mirror was smashed .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Is the car owner a lady with deafening voice ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes ! How do you know that ?
segments.speaker: S1
